Simon Podhajsky

Data Manager

Simon is a Data Manager at SRI. He previously worked as a Postgraduate Associate at the Yale Decision Neuroscience Lab and as a Lead Developer at Yale SDMP. Within the SIBIS project, he primarily attends to data integrity, general usability, and maintainable system design.
